name: dropbizplan
description: Kompleksowe narzędzie do zarządzania biznesem dropshippingowym

scripts.start: concurrently "cd server && npm start" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.dev: node --no-deprecation ./node_modules/concurrently/dist/bin/concurrently.js "cd server && npm run dev" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.dev-win: node --no-deprecation ./node_modules/concurrently/dist/bin/concurrently.js "cd server && npm run dev" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.build: cd client && npm run build && cd ../server && npm run build

author: Mateusz Betlej
